text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Polohivskyi Raion | native_name = Пологівський район | native_name_lang = uk | settlement_type = Raion | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_flag = Polohivskyj rayon prapor.png | flag_alt = Flag of Pologivskyi Raion | image_shield = Polohivskiy rayon gerb.png | shield_alt = Coat of arms of Pologivskyi Raion | image_map = Pologovskiy rayon 2020.svg | mapsize = 225px | map_alt = | map_caption = | pushpin_map = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = Oblast | subdivision_name1 = | established_title = Established | established_date = 1923 | seat_type = Admin. center | seat = Polohy | leader_party = | leader_title = Governor | leader_name = Yuriy Kovalenko | leader_title1 = Chairman | leader_name1 = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = https://www.zoda.gov.ua/files/WP_Article_File/original/000142/142760.pdf | area_total_km2 = 6762.5 | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 163641 | population_as_of = 2022 | population_density_km2 = auto | timezone1 = EET | utc_offset1 = +02:00 | timezone1_DST = EEST | utc_offset1_DST = +03:00 | postal_code_type = Postal index | postal_code = 70600—70661 | area_code_type = Area code | area_code = +380 6165 | iso_code = | website = | footnotes = }} Polohy Raion is one of the five raions (districts) of Zaporizhzhia oblast in southern Ukraine. The administrative center of the district is the town of Polohy. Parts of Polohy Raion are occupied by Russian soldiers (as of 2024). ==Cities and other settlements== Cities * Huliaipole * Molochansk * Orikhiv (map) * Polohy *Tokmak (map) Urban-type settlements *Kamianka (Bilmak until 2021) *Komysh-Zoria *Rozivka *Zaliznychne Villages *Basan (map) *Chereshneve (map) *Chervonohirka, Tokmak hromada (map) *Chystopillia, Tokmak (map) *Dibrova ( map) *Fabrychne, Tokmak (map) *Fedorivka (map) *Hryhorivka (map) *Inzhenerne (map) *Kharkove, Tokmak (map) *Kinski Rozdory (map) *Kopani (map) *Kostiantynivka (map) *Myrne, Tokmak (map) *Nesterianka (map) *Nove, Tokmak *Novofedorivka (map) *Novokarlivka (map) *Novopokrovka, Tokmak (map) *Novoselivka *Ocheretuvate, Tokmak (map) *Pokrovske, Tokmak (map) *Polohy (village) *Pshenychne, Tokmak (map) *Reshetylivske *Rivne, Tokmak (map) *Robotyne, Tokmak (map) *Sadove, Tokmak (map) *Semenivka *Shevchenkove, Tokmak (map) *Skeliuvate, Tokmak (map) *Snihurivka , Tokmak (map) *Solodka Balka, Tokmak (map) *Tarasivka *Trudove, Tokmak (map) *Ukrainske *Urozhaine (map) *Verbove *Voskresenka *Zamozhne, Tokmak *Zelenyi Hai *Zrazkove ==Related pages== *War in Ukraine ==References== Category:Raions of Ukraine Category:Zaporizhzhia Oblast
